title: ff
body: who can help me manage with pvp.net patcher kelner error?

replies.body:
I should be able to help you out with that!  If this error is repeatedly appearing, it sounds like there is an issue with your OS Permissions where your OS simply isn't letting League of Legends launch itself.  To get this resolved, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104).

Let me know if you are still experiencing this error after these steps!
